To overcome the external plotting issue and have the plots displayed in the plots panel:
- I added all the dependencies for the MyPackage in the `Package.toml` of the test package
- Replaced `using MyPackage` in `test/runtests.jl` with `include("../src/MyPackage.jl")`
- Open up `test/runtests.jl` in VSCode
- “Julia: Change to This Directory”
- “Julia: Activate This Environment”
- “Julia: Execute File in REPL”
voilá!
